regen.absent_element: control action on the units to turn them on or off after request generation
regen.new_specification: The system shall execute control actions on the heating or cooling units to ensure they are turned on or off after the request generation.

regen.absent_element: Facilitating actual turning on or off of the units after request generation
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that the heating or cooling unit executes the request to turn on or off, providing feedback on the outcome.
The system shall generate heating/cooling requests only when predefined environmental conditions are met.

label: This request shall indicate whether that unit is to be turned on or off
absence: indication of on/off status in the request
